source: Reward for inviting Jean to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is $[A1502], equip this card.
After $[A1502] equips this card, immediately use $[S15023] once.
When your $[A1502], who has this card equipped, is on the field, Dandelion Field will cause you to deal +1 Anemo DMG.
(You must have $[A1502] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
